import { lazy, useState } from "react"; import { CloudUploadIcon } from "lucide-react"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; const ResearchModal = lazy(() => import("../ResearchModal")); const Header = () => { const [showModal, setShowModal] = useState(false); const user = useSelector((state) => state?.auth.user); const handleResearchModal = () => { setShowModal(false) } return ( <>

Naval Intellectual Portal for Unified Knowledge ( निपुण )

User Profile

Devanand Verma

user@email.com

) } export default Header;
